page.title: 11Conservation in Newent
page.content: The character of Newent has changed dramatically in the period since the 2nd World War. Several housing estates, both private and council have been built and as Newent becomes more residential many older properties have been modernised and others demolished and rebuilt. This steadily increasing change has already meant the loss of some of 'old Newent' for ever. ******* Ever mindful of our local heritage a new organisation{ The Newent Society} was formed in 1985 to protect the environment and to encourage a high standard of architecture and planning and aims to give local people more say in the future of the area. To encourage the people of the area to think about their Town, a{'Newent {Day'}was organised in September 1985.
